name: Click Between Frames
description: Allows inputs to register between frames. Like TPS Bypass or Draw Divide, but with less lag and fewer physics bugs.

soft-toggle.name: Disable Mod
soft-toggle.description: Disable the mod's functionality without needing to restart GD. The mod may still have unintended effects with this checked, so be careful.

right-click.name: Right Click P2
right-click.description: Use right click for player 2 jump.

late-cutoff.name: Late Input Cutoff
late-cutoff.description:
Check for inputs near the end of the frame instead of the start. 

Slightly reduces input lag, but also slightly reduces precision. May help if you are experiencing dropped or delayed inputs.

actual-delta.name: Physics Bypass
actual-delta.description:
Reduces stuttering on some FPS values. "Disable mod" must be unchecked. 

THIS WILL ALTER PHYSICS AND MAY BREAK SOME LEVELS! DON'T USE THIS IF YOUR LIST/LEADERBOARD BANS PHYSICS BYPASS!
